name: Automatisation du contenu Instagram et des DM avec Gemini, Telegram et Apify
description:
# ü§ñ Suite d'automatisation Instagram : Chatbot IA & Puissance de contenu

## Aper√ßu du flux de travail

Ce flux de travail n8n √† la pointe de la technologie est une solution d'automatisation compl√®te con√ßue pour rationaliser diverses op√©rations Instagram. Il combine un chatbot IA intelligent pour la gestion des messages directs, le suivi automatis√© des utilisateurs et un syst√®me avanc√© de g√©n√©ration de contenu, le tout int√©gr√© pour am√©liorer votre pr√©sence et votre efficacit√© sur Instagram.

Ce flux de travail automatise :

  * **Gestion des messages directs Instagram via le chatbot Telegram** :
      * √âcoute les nouveaux messages sur **Telegram**.
      * Achemine les messages d'un utilisateur Instagram sp√©cifique (`Wolf23000`) pour traitement.
      * Utilise un **agent IA (aliment√© par les mod√®les de pointe d'OpenRouter)** pour d√©terminer l'intention du message (par exemple, r√©pondre, ex√©cuter une action li√©e √† Instagram comme obtenir des informations de profil, publier ou suivre).
      * Envoie des r√©ponses g√©n√©r√©es par l'IA √† l'utilisateur via **Telegram**.
  * **Automatisation du suivi des utilisateurs Instagram** :
      * Pr√©vu pour s'ex√©cuter √† intervalles r√©guliers (horaire).
      * Traite une liste de noms d'utilisateur (probablement d'une feuille Google, bien que non explicitement montr√© dans le JSON fourni, c'est un mod√®le courant pour "Suivre automatiquement les utilisateurs de la feuille" note autocollante).
      * Initie des actions de suivi sur Instagram pour les utilisateurs sp√©cifi√©s.
  * **G√©n√®re et planifie des publications Instagram** :
      * Pr√©vu pour s'ex√©cuter mensuellement.
      * Tire parti d'un **agent IA (aliment√© par OpenRouter)** pour g√©n√©rer **30 ou 31 id√©es de publications Instagram** pour le mois en cours, bas√© sur un "profil de personnalit√© Instagram" pr√©d√©fini.
      * Chaque id√©e de publication comprend un `imagePrompt` (pour la g√©n√©ration d'images par IA), une `caption` avec des emojis et des hashtags, et une `scheduledDate`.
      * Affine ces id√©es de publication en am√©liorant le `imagePrompt` pour √™tre plus vivant et d√©taill√© pour la g√©n√©ration d'images par IA, et en polissant la `caption` pour un engagement optimal.
      * Met √† jour une feuille Google ("plan de g√©n√©ration de publications") avec le contenu g√©n√©r√©, y compris les prompts d'image am√©lior√©s et les URL d'images r√©sultantes (pr√©sum√©ment d'une √©tape de g√©n√©ration d'images s√©par√©e non enti√®rement d√©taill√©e dans le JSON fourni, mais impliqu√©e par les mises √† jour `image_url`).

-----

## Avantages cl√©s

  * **Gestion intelligente des DM** : Automatisez les r√©ponses et les actions pour les messages directs Instagram, garantissant des interactions opportunes et pertinentes sans effort manuel.
  * **Croissance d'audience sans effort** : Suivez automatiquement des utilisateurs cibles, √©largissant votre port√©e et votre engagement potentiel sur Instagram.
  * **Cr√©ation de contenu aliment√©e par IA** : G√©n√©rez un mois complet d'id√©es de publications Instagram diversifi√©es et engageantes adapt√©es √† une personnalit√© sp√©cifique, compl√®tes avec des prompts d'image et des l√©gendes.
  * **Optimisation du contenu** : Am√©liorez automatiquement les prompts d'image pour une meilleure g√©n√©ration d'images par IA et affinez les l√©gendes pour un impact maximal.
  * **Gain de temps** : R√©duisez consid√©rablement la charge de travail manuelle associ√©e √† la gestion d'Instagram, des messages directs √† la planification et √† l'ex√©cution du contenu.
  * **Voix de marque coh√©rente** : Maintenez une pr√©sence coh√©rente et engageante sur Instagram avec du contenu g√©n√©r√© par IA align√© sur votre personnalit√© d√©finie.

-----

## Exigences de configuration

Pour configurer et ex√©cuter ce flux de travail, vous aurez besoin des √©l√©ments suivants :

  * **Installation de n8n** :
      * Installez n8n (cloud ou auto-h√©berg√©). La derni√®re version stable, √† partir de juillet 2025, est **v1.101.1**.
      * Importez la configuration du flux de travail.
      * Configurez les identifiants API pour tous les services int√©gr√©s.
      * Configurez les pr√©f√©rences de planification pour un fonctionnement continu.
      * **Exigences syst√®me pour l'auto-h√©bergement** : Un processeur moderne multi-c≈ìurs (minimum 2 c≈ìurs, 4 recommand√©s), 2 Go de RAM (4 Go ou plus recommand√©s), et 20 Go de stockage SSD libre. La version Node.js 16 ou ult√©rieure (18.x LTS recommand√©e) est requise. PostgreSQL est la base de donn√©es recommand√©e pour la production.
  * **Acc√®s √† l'API Telegram** :
      * Cr√©ez un bot Telegram via BotFather et obtenez votre jeton API.
      * Configurez le n≈ìud **Telegram Trigger** avec les identifiants API de votre bot pour recevoir des messages.
      * **Tarification** : L'API de Telegram est gratuite √† utiliser.
  * **Acc√®s √† l'API OpenRouter** :
      * Cr√©ez un compte OpenRouter et g√©n√©rez une cl√© API.
      * Cette cl√© (`{{votre cl√© API open router }}` comme vu dans le code) est utilis√©e pour acc√©der √† leurs mod√®les de chat (par exemple, `google/gemini-2.5-flash-preview`) pour les op√©rations de l'agent IA.
      * **Tarification** : OpenRouter propose une vari√©t√© de mod√®les avec diff√©rentes structures tarifaires, y compris certains mod√®les gratuits comme DeepSeek R1. La plupart des mod√®les fonctionnent sur une base de paiement √† l'utilisation, avec des co√ªts clairement affich√©s pour chaque mod√®le et prompt.
  * **ID de session Instagram** :
      * Vous aurez besoin d'un ID de session Instagram valide (`{{ votre ID de session Instagram }}` comme vu dans le code) pour que le flux de travail interagisse avec Instagram. Cela implique g√©n√©ralement de l'extraire des cookies de votre navigateur apr√®s vous √™tre connect√© √† Instagram.
      * **Avertissement** : Les conditions de service d'Instagram interdisent g√©n√©ralement les interactions automatis√©es, et l'utilisation d'ID de session pour le scraping ou l'automatisation peut entra√Æner la suspension du compte. Utilisez avec une extr√™me prudence et √† vos risques et p√©rils.
  * **Configuration du jeton Apify** :
        *Vous devrez remplacer `{{ votre jeton apify }}` par votre jeton apify dans les requ√™tes https
  * **Identifiants Google Sheets** :
      * Une cl√© API Google Cloud avec acc√®s √† Google Sheets.
      * Configurez l'authentification OAuth2 dans n8n pour un acc√®s en lecture/√©criture √† votre feuille de calcul "plan de g√©n√©ration de publications" (ID de document : `1XHNwAXR4USThaAzX1Y6M5PF2P8WqCBU8mi34FBLkV6M`). Cette feuille est utilis√©e pour stocker et g√©rer les id√©es de publications g√©n√©r√©es.
      * **Tarification** : L'API Google Sheets est g√©n√©ralement gratuite pour la plupart des cas d'utilisation courants, avec des quotas g√©n√©reux par minute (300 lectures et 300 √©critures par minute par projet, 60 par utilisateur par projet). Aucun frais suppl√©mentaire n'est encouru pour le d√©passement de ces limites.
        [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Ze5SC1g6Q5VzMAKYx0zmqlT00Db1HOchUth1jrPyM2Y/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Ze5SC1g6Q5VzMAKYx0zmqlT00Db1HOchUth1jrPyM2Y/edit?usp=sharing)
        [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XHNwAXR4USThaAzX1Y6M5PF2P8WqCBU8mi34FBLkV6M/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XHNwAXR4USThaAzX1Y6M5PF2P8WqCBU8mi34FBLkV6M/edit?usp=sharing)
  * **JSON de personnalit√© Instagram pr√©d√©fini** :
      * Le flux de travail repose sur un objet JSON d√©taill√© d√©finissant une "personnalit√© Instagram" (par exemple, `user_id`, `username`, `full_name`, `bio`, `content_preferences`, `personality_traits`, `unfulancer_attributes`). Ce JSON doit √™tre correctement d√©fini dans les n≈ìuds **Code** (`Variables`, `Variables1`, `Variables2`) pour guider la g√©n√©ration de contenu par l'IA.

-----

## Architecture du flux de travail

```
[D√©clencheur de nouveau message Telegram]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Variables (D√©finir la cl√© API OpenRouter, la personnalit√© Instagram, l'ID de session)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Switch (Filtrer les messages de 'Wolf23000' et s'assurer que le texte du message existe)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Modifier les champs (Extraire le texte du message)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Agent IA (D√©terminer l'action en fonction de l'intention du message)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Analyseur de sortie structur√© (Analyser la sortie JSON de l'agent IA)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Switch1 (Acheminer en fonction de l'action d√©termin√©e par l'agent IA : chat_back, run_agent, get_instagram_profile)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
    ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ
    ‚ñº             ‚ñº             ‚ñº             ‚ñº
[Envoyer un message texte1 (R√©pondre)] [Envoyer un message texte (Confirmation de l'agent)] [Envoyer un message texte2 (Confirmation de profil)]
    ‚ñ≤
    ‚îÇ
[D√©clencheur de planification (Horaire pour le suivi Instagram)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Variables (D√©finir la cl√© API OpenRouter, la personnalit√© Instagram, l'ID de session)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code (Pr√©parer les noms d'utilisateur pour le suivi)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code1 (Traiter les noms d'utilisateur suivis)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[D√©clencheur de planification2 (Mensuel pour la g√©n√©ration de publications Instagram)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Agent IA1 (G√©n√©rer des id√©es de publications Instagram mensuelles)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Mod√®le de chat OpenRouter (Mod√®le IA pour la g√©n√©ration de contenu)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code2 (Analyser la sortie JSON de l'agent IA)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[D√©clencheur de planification3 (Quotidien pour le raffinement de la g√©n√©ration de publications et la publication automatique)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Agent IA2 (Am√©liorer les prompts d'image et les l√©gendes)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Mod√®le de chat OpenRouter2 (Mod√®le IA pour le raffinement des prompts)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Mettre √† jour la ligne dans sheet1 (Mettre √† jour la feuille Google avec le contenu am√©lior√©)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Obtenir la ou les lignes dans sheet2 (R√©cup√©rer des donn√©es de la feuille Google)]
```


-----

## Connectez-vous avec moi

Explorer l'automatisation des m√©dias sociaux aliment√©e par IA ?

parameters.text:
=Based on the following Instagram personality profile:
{{ $json.user_personality }}
Generate exactly 31 or30 based of number of days on current month  Instagram post ideas for the current month [{{ $json.Month }}-{{ $json.Year }}] ‚Äî one for each day.

Each post must include:
- `imagePrompt`: A short visual description that could be used for image generation (15‚Äì30 words)
- `caption`: An engaging Instagram caption matching Sophia‚Äôs tone, using emojis
- `scheduledDate`: A random day and time in the current month (between 09:00 and 18:00)

Output should be a **valid JSON array** with 31 objects. Do not include explanations or commentary.

Example:
[
  {
    "imagePrompt": "A journal with coffee on a wooden table",
    "caption": "‚òï‚ú® Start your day with intention. Journaling clears the mind and centers the soul. #MorningRitual",
    "scheduledDate": "2025-08-01"
  },
  ...
]

options.systemMessage:
You are a content strategist specialized in Instagram marketing.

Your task is to generate exactly 31 Instagram post ideas for the current month. Each post must be creative, diverse, and optimized for engagement.

Each post should include:
- `imagePrompt`: A short, vivid prompt (15‚Äì30 words) to generate an image (e.g., ‚ÄúA dog playing in autumn leaves‚Äù)
- `caption`: A catchy Instagram caption (with emojis) that matches the image
- `scheduledDate`: A date in the current month, spaced out across all 31 days.

Output everything as a valid JSON array. Do **not** include any explanation or commentary ‚Äî only the JSON.

Example:
[
  {
    "imagePrompt": "Sunset over a tropical beach",
    "caption": "üåÖ Nothing beats sunset vibes! #TropicalEscape",
    "scheduledDate": "2025-08-01"
  },
  ...
]

parameters.content: ## Generate posts plain Based on Your personality JSON

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert Instagram content strategist and prompt engineer for AI-generated visuals.

Your task is to process a JSON object representing an Instagram post idea and improve it for publication. This includes:

1. Enhancing the `imagePrompt` to make it much more vivid, descriptive, and suitable for AI image generation (DALL¬∑E, Midjourney, etc.). Use clear descriptions of:
   - Environment and background
   - Characters and their appearance
   - Actions or mood
   - Lighting, color tone, and style
   - Camera angle or composition (optional)
   - Art style (e.g., photo-realistic, cinematic, flat illustration ‚Äî if implied)

2. Refining the `caption` to make it concise, engaging, grammatically polished, and aligned with Instagram best practices (emoji use, tone, and formatting).

Return your result as a valid JSON object with the following fields:
- `row_number`: Same as input.
- `enhancedImagePrompt`: Fully-detailed, visual, AI-ready description (1‚Äì2 sentences max).
- `enhancedCaption`: Polished caption with emojis and hashtags (do not make it robotic).
- `scheduledDate`: Unchanged from input.

parameters.jsCode:
// Loop over input items and add a new field called 'myNewField' to the JSON of each one
for (const item of $input.all()) {
  item.json.openrouterApiKey = "{{your open router api key }}";
   item.json.user_personality= "{
  "user_id": "aethermsaid8",
  "username": "aethermsaid8",
  "full_name": "Sarah Msaid",
  "age": 28,
  "location": "Brooklyn, NY",
  "bio": "Embracing the beautiful mess. Sharing real life, not just highlight reels. Coffee, cats, and questionable life choices. ‚òïüêàü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è",
  "content_preferences": {
    "themes": [
      "daily life struggles",
      "authentic moments",
      "niche hobbies (e.g., vintage board games, obscure indie music)",
      "pet antics",
      "DIY fails",
      "local hidden gems"
    ],
    "post_frequency_per_week": 3,
    "preferred_media_types": [
      "photo",
      "carousel",
      "short-form video (reels)"
    ],
    "caption_style": "humorous, self-deprecating, relatable, conversational, slightly cynical but ultimately warm",
    "hashtag_style": "mix of popular, niche, and ironic hashtags"
  },
  "personality_traits": {
    "values": [
      "authenticity",
      "humor",
      "creativity",
      "community",
      "self-acceptance"
    ],
    "interests": [
      "independent cinema",
      "thrift store finds",
      "cooking (badly)",
      "reading obscure non-fiction",
      "urban exploration",
      "cats"
    ],
    "tone_of_voice_keywords": [
      "sarcastic",
      "witty", "down-to-earth",
      "observational",
      "playful"
    ]
  },
  "unfulancer_attributes": {
    "reason_for_unfulancing": "prefers genuine connection over chasing virality",
    "content_focus": "relatability over perfection",
    "niche_appeal": "attracts followers who are tired of curated feeds",
    "monetization_approach": "minimal or none, occasional genuine collaborations with small businesses"
  }
}"
  

 
  item.json.instagram_session_id="{{ your instagram session ID }}"
  
}

return $input.all();

      "authentic moments",
      "niche hobbies (e.g., vintage board games, obscure indie music)",
      "pet antics",
      "DIY fails",
      "local hidden gems"
    ],
    "post_frequency_per_week": 3,
    "preferred_media_types": [
      "photo",
      "carousel",
      "short-form video (reels)"
    ],
    "caption_style": "humorous, self-deprecating, relatable, conversational, slightly cynical but ultimately warm",
    "hashtag_style": "mix of popular, niche, and ironic hashtags"
  },
  "personality_traits": {
    "values": [
      "authenticity",
      "humor",
      "creativity",
      "community",
      "self-acceptance"
    ],
    "interests": [
      "independent cinema",
      "thrift store finds",
      "cooking (badly)",
      "reading obscure non-fiction",
      "urban exploration",
      "cats"
    ],
    "tone_of_voice_keywords": [
      "sarcastic",
      "witty", "down-to-earth",
      "observational",
      "playful"
    ]
  },
  "unfulancer_attributes": {
    "reason_for_unfulancing": "prefers genuine connection over chasing virality",
    "content_focus": "relatability over perfection",
    "niche_appeal": "attracts followers who are tired of curated feeds",
    "monetization_approach": "minimal or none, occasional genuine collaborations with small businesses"
  }
}"
  

 
  item.json.instagram_session_id="{{ your instagram session ID }}"
  
}

return $input.all();

parameters.content:
# ü§ñ Instagram Automation Suite: AI Chatbot & Content Powerhouse

## Workflow Overview

This cutting-edge n8n workflow is a comprehensive automation solution designed to streamline various Instagram operations. It combines an intelligent AI chatbot for direct message management, automated user following, and an advanced content generation system, all integrated to enhance your Instagram presence and efficiency.

This workflow automatically:

  * **Manages Instagram Direct Messages via Telegram Chatbot**:
      * Listens for new messages on **Telegram**.
      * Routes messages from a specific Instagram user (`Wolf23000`) for processing.
      * Utilizes an **AI agent (powered by OpenRouter's cutting-edge models)** to determine the intent of the message (e.g., chat back, run an Instagram-related action like getting profile info, posting, or following).
      * Sends AI-generated responses back to the user via **Telegram**.
  * **Automates Instagram User Following**:
      * Scheduled to run at regular intervals (hourly).
      * Processes a list of usernames (likely from a Google Sheet, though not explicitly shown in the provided JSON, it's a common pattern for "Auto Follow users from sheet" sticky note).
      * Initiates following actions on Instagram for the specified users.
  * **Generates & Schedules Instagram Posts**:
      * Scheduled to run monthly.
      * Leverages an **AI agent (powered by OpenRouter)** to generate **30 or 31 Instagram post ideas** for the current month, based on a predefined "Instagram personality profile."
      * Each post idea includes an `imagePrompt` (for AI image generation), a `caption` with emojis and hashtags, and a `scheduledDate`.
      * Refines these post ideas by enhancing the `imagePrompt` to be more vivid and detailed for AI image generation, and polishing the `caption` for optimal engagement.
      * Updates a Google Sheet ("posts generation plan") with the generated content, including the enhanced image prompts and the resulting image URLs (presumably from a separate image generation step not fully detailed in the provided JSON, but implied by `image_url` updates).

-----

## Key Benefits

  * **Intelligent DM Management**: Automate responses and actions for Instagram direct messages, ensuring timely and relevant interactions without manual effort.
  * **Effortless Audience Growth**: Automatically follow target users, expanding your reach and potential engagement on Instagram.
  * **AI-Powered Content Creation**: Generate a full month's worth of diverse, engaging Instagram post ideas tailored to a specific personality, complete with image prompts and captions.
  * **Content Optimization**: Automatically enhance image prompts for better AI image generation and refine captions for maximum impact.
  * **Time-Saving**: Significantly reduce the manual workload associated with Instagram management, from direct messages to content planning and execution.
  * **Consistent Brand Voice**: Maintain a consistent and engaging presence on Instagram with AI-generated content aligned with your defined personality.

-----

## Setup Requirements

To set up and run this workflow, you'll need the following:

  * **n8n Installation**:
      * Install n8n (cloud or self-hosted). The latest stable version, as of July 2025, is **v1.101.1**.
      * Import the workflow configuration.
      * Configure API credentials for all integrated services.
      * Set up scheduling preferences for continuous operation.
      * **System Requirements for Self-Hosting**: A modern multi-core processor (2 cores minimum, 4 recommended), 2 GB RAM (4 GB or more recommended), and 20 GB of free SSD storage. Node.js version 16 or later (18.x LTS recommended) is required. PostgreSQL is the recommended database for production.
  * **Telegram API Access**:
      * Create a Telegram bot via BotFather and obtain your API token.
      * Configure the **Telegram Trigger** node with your bot's API credentials to receive messages.
      * **Pricing**: Telegram's API is free to use.
  * **OpenRouter API Access**:
      * Create an OpenRouter account and generate an API key.
      * This key (`{{your open router api key }}` as seen in the code) is used to access their chat models (e.g., `google/gemini-2.5-flash-preview`) for AI agent operations.
      * **Pricing**: OpenRouter offers a variety of models with different pricing structures, including some free models like DeepSeek R1. Most models operate on a pay-per-usage basis, with costs clearly displayed for each model and prompt.
  * **Instagram Session ID**:
      * You'll need a valid Instagram session ID (`{{ your instagram session ID }}` as seen in the code) for the workflow to interact with Instagram. This usually involves extracting it from your browser's cookies after logging into Instagram.
      * **Caution**: Instagram's terms of service generally prohibit automated interactions, and using session IDs for scraping or automation can lead to account suspension. Use with extreme caution and at your own risk.
  * **Google Sheets Credentials**:
      * A Google Cloud API key with access to Google Sheets.
      * Set up OAuth2 authentication in n8n for read/write access to your "posts generation plan" spreadsheet (Document ID: `1XHNwAXR4USThaAzX1Y6M5PF2P8WqCBU8mi34FBLkV6M`). This sheet is used to store and manage generated post ideas.
      * **Pricing**: The Google Sheets API is generally free for most common use cases, with generous per-minute quotas (300 read and 300 write requests per minute per project, 60 per user per project). No additional charges are incurred for exceeding these limits.
  * **Predefined Instagram Personality JSON**:
      * The workflow relies on a detailed JSON object defining an "Instagram personality" (e.g., `user_id`, `username`, `full_name`, `bio`, `content_preferences`, `personality_traits`, `unfulancer_attributes`). This JSON needs to be correctly set within the **Code** nodes (`Variables`, `Variables1`, `Variables2`) to guide the AI content generation.

-----

## Workflow Architecture

```
[Telegram New Message Trigger]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Variables (Set OpenRouter API Key, Instagram Personality, Session ID)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Switch (Filter messages from 'Wolf23000' and ensure message text exists)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Edit Fields (Extract message text)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[AI Agent (Determine action based on message intent)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Structured Output Parser (Parse AI agent's JSON output)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Switch1 (Route based on AI agent's determined action: chat_back, run_agent, get_instagram_profile)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
    ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ             ‚îÇ
    ‚ñº             ‚ñº             ‚ñº             ‚ñº
[Send a text message1 (Chat back)] [Send a text message (Run agent confirmation)] [Send a text message2 (Get profile confirmation)]
    ‚ñ≤
    ‚îÇ
[Schedule Trigger (Hourly for Instagram follow)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Variables (Set OpenRouter API Key, Instagram Personality, Session ID)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code (Prepare usernames for following)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code1 (Process followed usernames)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Schedule Trigger2 (Monthly for Instagram post generation)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[AI Agent1 (Generate monthly Instagram post ideas)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[OpenRouter Chat Model (AI Model for content generation)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Code2 (Parse AI agent's JSON output)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Schedule Trigger3 (Daily for post generation refinement and auto-posting)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[AI Agent2 (Enhance image prompts and captions)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[OpenRouter Chat Model2 (AI Model for prompt refinement)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Update row in sheet1 (Update Google Sheet with enhanced content)]
    ‚¨áÔ∏è
[Get row(s) in sheet2 (Retrieve data from Google Sheet)]
```

-----

## Connect With Me

Exploring AI-Powered Social Media Automation?
üìß **Email**: mohamedgb00714@gmail.com
üíº **LinkedIn**: [Mohamed el Hadi Msaid](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohamed-el-hadi-m-said-1a9a5095/)

**Supercharge your Instagram presence with intelligent automation and AI-driven content\!** üöÄ
